sections.title: Choosing the Right Motor
sections.content: FTC allows several types of DC motors, each with unique characteristics. Choosing the right motor is crucial for your robot's performance.

sections.title: FTC Motor Options
sections.subtitle: Commonly used motors
items: Each has different speed (RPM) and torque

sections.title: Comparing Motor Specs
Selection Guide
sections.content: Select motors based on your robot's needs: speed for drivetrains, torque for arms and lifts.
